personal.name: Antonio Mindov
personal.title: Senior Software Developer & AI Enthusiast
personal.quote: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic. - Arthur C. Clarke
personal.bio: Senior developer with a passion for exploring the deepest layers of technology. From blockchain to AI, from 3D rendering to bioinformatics, I thrive on understanding how things really work beneath the surface.

philosophy.title: Exploration Mentality
philosophy.content: I believe in pursuing deep understanding as a fundamental principle. Whether it's diving into the intricate workings of distributed systems, searching the whole internet for that lost thread which gives the truth, or reading research papers to implement cutting-edge algorithms - each journey into complexity reveals new layers of understanding. Surface-level understanding is merely the beginning; true knowledge emerges from embracing the profound interconnectedness of all systems.

journey.title: TUES
journey.subtitle: Systems Programming
journey.description: Where it all began - diving into systems programming and laying the foundation for a career in software development.

journey.title: Android Developer
journey.subtitle: First Professional Steps
journey.description: Learned professional development practices, worked directly with clients, and provided valuable solutions.

journey.title: Bachelor's in Informatics
journey.subtitle: Another step in the learning journey
journey.description: Advanced computer science education while working professionally, expanding theoretical knowledge alongside practical experience.

journey.title: Software Developer
journey.subtitle: 3D Rendering & Full-Stack
journey.organization: Chaos - Market Leader in 3D Rendering Software
journey.description: Developed and maintained build systems supporting 300+ developers, contributed to implementation of a distributed rendering library from scratch. Collaborated with cross-functional teams on Cosmos, a new 3D asset library product within the Chaos suite, working directly with product stakeholders to deliver optimal user experience.

journey.title: Senior Blockchain Developer
journey.subtitle: Blockchain Infrastructure & Web3 Solutions
journey.description: Managed HashPort cryptocurrency bridge platform, leading complete system stabilization and architectural improvements. Designed and implemented comprehensive testing frameworks and optimized CI/CD pipelines to ensure production reliability. Managed critical incident response and provided 24/7 technical support during high-impact production events.

journey.title: Tech Lead
journey.subtitle: Leading Innovation
journey.description: Led engineering teams and established technical vision for blockchain infrastructure. Mentored developers, drove architectural decisions, and aligned technical strategy with business goals.

journey.title: Senior Java Developer
journey.subtitle: Plugin Architecture
journey.description: Developed and maintained core system plugins, integrating Kafka messaging, implementing distributed systems, and ensuring system design standards.

journey.title: AI Developer
journey.subtitle: Semantic Caching for AI
journey.description: Developing and maintaining LangCache, a semantic caching solution for AI applications, optimizing model performance and reducing latency.

journey.title: Master's in Bioinformatics
journey.subtitle: Learning continues
journey.description: Currently studying bioinformatics, exploring the intersection of computer science and biology.

interests.name: Artificial Intelligence
interests.description: Passionate about AI technologies since high school, I believe that AI is the future and will change the world as we know it.

interests.name: Bioinformatics
interests.description: Recently exploring the intersection of computer science and biology, fascinated by computational approaches to biological problems.

interests.name: 3D Printing
interests.description: Love bringing digital designs into the physical world, experimenting with materials and creating functional objects.

interests.name: Archery
interests.description: Finding focus and precision through traditional archery, where every shot matters.

interests.name: Horse Riding
interests.description: Connecting with nature and developing trust and communication with majestic animals.
